headline: Is Colgate-Palmolive Company (CL) The Best Defensive Stock Amid Market Volatility?
summary: We recently published a list of 15 Best Defensive Stocks Amid Market Volatility In this article, we are going to take a look at where Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) stands against other best defensive stocks amid market volatility. With ongoing inflation, economic uncertainty, and global tensions, more investors are looking for ways to protect their money […]
